name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: 介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
schedule:
Week 1   Chap. 0  Introduction and Background
Week 2-4 (Chap.1 & Chap.21)
Week 2   The states of gases and The gas laws 
Week 3   The kinetic model of gases
Week 4   Real gases
Week 5   1st Examination
Week 6-8 Chap. 2: The First Law
Week 6   Work, heat, energy, and Expansion work
Week 7   Heat transactions and Enthalpy (Adiabatic change, Standard enthalpy changes, Standard enthalpies of formation)
Week 8   The temperature dependence of reaction enthalpies, State functions and exact differentials
Week 9-10 Chap. 3: The Second Law-1
Week 9   The Second Law The dispersal of energy and Entropy
Week 10  Entropy changes accompanying specific processes
Week 11  2nd Examination
Week 12-14 Chap. 3: The Second Law-2
Week 12  From Second Law to Third Law:
Week 13  The Helmholtz and Gibbs energies-1
Week 14  The Helmholtz and Gibbs energies-2
Week 15-16 Chap. 22 Kinetics
Week 15  The Rates of Chemical Reactions
Week 16  Rate Law 
Week 17  3rd Examination
Week 18  Make-up Day
scorePolicy:
• 二次考試各佔 40% ，平時分數 20%
• 點名不到一次扣學期總分1分。
materials: Physical Chemistry, Atkins’, Oxford University Press 2010, 9th ed. (歐亞代理)
